title: 【100的地图搬运】——Arrodil – Kathos Map
author: 壹佰佰佰
txt_content:
Arrodil – Kathos Map——————

介绍（翻译）：Arrodil是坐落在中山区的一个山谷做小买卖的城市。并不十分稀少，山上是众所周知的自然美景，和镇采取一切预防措施，以反映它们的美丽。热情邀请，来探讨下两院，并与当地人互动，或乘坐长途跋涉到最高的塔为一个视图，将让你无法呼吸。

——————
介绍（原话）：Arrodil is a small trading city nestled in a valley within the mountains. Not terribly populated, the mountains are known for their natural beauty, and the town takes every precaution to reflect their beauty. Warm and inviting, come explore the lower houses and interact with the locals, or take the trek up to the tallest tower for a view that will take your breath away.
———————
镇楼
